issue.title: Height scale when using png image as heightmap

content.raw: It's my understanding that the vertical size of the heightmap is based on the product of the Z value in the `<size>` element with the pixel values scaled from 0 to 1. In both examples, you have a z value of `0.5`, so I would expect a size of `0.5` only if you had pixel values of 0 and 1 (or 0, 255 in 8-bit).
